availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David C. Hartigan (Caldwell co, ky, resident )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, resident. Virginia native. Son of David C. Hartigan and Nancy Hartigan. Resident in Dickson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Resident in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Dickson County, Middle District, p. 141B.
"David C. Hartigan Jr. (1836-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial #80232009, accessed April 13, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/80232009.
KYR-0001-020-0013.
